prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)

sentences.english: Once again, he had forced back the Army of the Potomac.
sentences.chinese: 他再一次地強令召回了波托馬克河的部隊。

sentences.english: A Bivouac Fire on the Potomac.
sentences.chinese: 波托馬克河邊的篝火晚會。
